Klasse QuestionDTO

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
quizlogic.dto.QuestionDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class QuestionDTO extends DataTransportObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz question.

Each question contains:

  • The main question text
  • An optional title or short description
  • A list of possible answers
This class extends DataTransportObject for consistent ID and validation handling.

Used in both in-memory operations and persistent storage layers.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

    • contentEquals

      protected boolean contentEquals(DataTransportObject other)
      Compares the main content of this question to another for equality.

      Used for comparing new entities without an assigned ID.

      Angegeben von:
      contentEquals in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Parameter:
      other - DTO to compare against
      Gibt zurück:
      true if question text and title match

    • contentHashCode

      protected int contentHashCode()
      Computes a hash code based on question content.

      Used when the entity is new and not yet persisted.

      Angegeben von:
      contentHashCode in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      hash based on question text and title

    • getContentString

      protected String getContentString()
      Returns a string summary of question content for debugging.
      Angegeben von:
      getContentString in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      formatted string showing title and number of answers

    • validate

      protected void validate()
      Validates the question content.
      • Question text must not be null or empty
      • Question text must not exceed 1000 characters
      • Question title, if present, must not exceed 200 characters
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
